title: Persistent Issue: No block headers to write in this log period
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version` 
v2.35.0 and v2.36.1

OS & Version: Fedora36

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

--chain bsc --externalcl --snapshots=true --db.pagesize=16k --datadir=/erigon/data/bsc --txpool.disable --nat=extip:X,X,X,X --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.vhosts=* --maxpeers=100 --prune=disabled


Concensus Layer: nimbus

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config): externalcl

Chain/Network: 

 BSC

@AskAlexSharov This issue is still happening and is now worse than ever for us. Previously it was rare that we had to restart erigon, usually it would show this error but progress, now it get's stuck here and requires a restart and happens multiple times a day on v2.35.0 and v2.36.1. PLease advise as this is making it difficult to use erigon on BSC.
Moreover, I found that in this state memory leak is insane. It consumes almost all my memory 60GB and it is happening only when the process is stuck
I've upgraded to v2.37.0-stable and am testing it. I have not seen this error yet but will continue to monitor.
